title: Snoop Dogg's grandson Kai tragically dies at 10 days old in the hospital
text:
Snoop Dogg's infant grandson has tragically passed away.

The 47-year-old rapper's son, Corde Broadus, took to Instagram to share the devastating news of the death of his son Kai Love, who passed just 10 days after he was born.

"My Son Kai brought so much love and positivity into this world,” the caption began, alongside a heartbreaking video of his 13-month-old daughter Elleven Love giving her newborn brother with her mother in the NICU.

"Let’s all cherish life and those we love while we are here. Thank you," he added.

The family has not released the cause of death and Snoop Dogg had not commented on the tragedy.

Snoop Dogg is married to his wife of 22 years. Shante. The couple share daughter Cori, 20, and three sons: Corde, 23, Julian, 21, and Cordell, 22.
description: The 47-year-old rapper's son, Corde Broadus, took to Instagram to share the devastating news about the death of his infant son.
